Reviews.Title: “Quite simply the worst Hotel room I've ever seen”

Reviews.Content: originally booked called booked agreed move sister hotel booking scream gig olympia fantastic booked 4 guys share single beds ensuite facilities arrival keys front door plaza hotel door rex sign door plaza sends rex check 2 nights 4 sharing top split family 2 adults kids night daylight robbery below standard hotel check pay cash card machine action reception previous ownership hotels gone administration hence card machine wasnt available pay offered settle paypal opted own laptop fortunate paypal account laptop circumstances hotels computer payment key logging recording details possibilty look pictures theyre worth thousand words remember booked single beds ensuite double singles shower cubicle beside roof steam gotten thats blokes actually shower cubicle privacy shy heart toilet shower shared floor passed decor rising damp bb look hilton worn rough communal shower antiquated produced lukewarm water bedrooms access toilet theyre finished breakfast complimentary consisted fried scrambled eggs toast beans cereal coffeetea five table serves hotels block queues outside time served 15 hours ok serving own residents insufficient pages hotel isnt worth unless youre grading below reasonable standard
